songs.title: Talk Me Home
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
We can go back now it’s over
Stain my heart on your shoulder
Let go of all our wires
And lie beneath the silence

[Pre-Chorus]
We just speak to make it through
Facing all we’ve got to lose
So wash away
Fighting everything we are
Feeling blisters on my heart
To make you stay

[Chorus]
So talk me home
Don’t let up
I can hear your heart through the static
Don’t tell me that it’s slow
And I know
That you’ll be gone in the morning
But tonight just talk me home
Talk me home

[Verse 2]
We can go back now it’s over
Fight the dark as it gets colder
But I can’t stop you from leaving
Hurts my lungs when I breath in

[Pre-Chorus]
We just speak to make it through
Facing all we’ve got to lose
So wash away
Fighting everything we are
Feeling blisters on my heart
To make you stay

[Chorus]
So talk me home
Don’t let up
I can hear your heart through the static
Don’t tell me that it’s slow
And I know
That you’ll be gone in the morning
But tonight just talk me home
Talk me home

[Bridge]
And we could run away again
And throw away your conscience
Or we could find a way to begin
Everything
And we could run away again
And throw away your conscience
Or we could find a way to begin
Everything

[Chorus]
So talk me home
Don’t let up
I can hear your heart through the static
Don’t tell me that it’s slow
And I know
That you’ll be gone in the morning
But tonight just talk me home
Don’t let up
I can hear your heart through the static
Don’t tell me that it’s slow
And I know
That you’ll be gone in the morning
But tonight just talk me home
Talk me home
